name: Hyades
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Alexa Skill to control Hyades Smart Home Devices. This skill allows to use Alexa to manage Hyades smart home devices. The Alexa skill sends commands to Hyades Smart Home Gateway and the gateway communicates to the smart devices in your home. Additional information on our range of smart home products and features can be found at https://www.hyadesthings.com/#about
